item.title: white house meeting on budget fails to end impasse

item.title: post-katrina heart attack rate three-times higher: study
item.description: new orleans residents were found to have three times the rate of heart attacks four years after the devastation of hurricane katrina than before the storm and levee break that flooded the city, according to a study presented at a major heart meeting on sunday.

item.title: kindergarten boy was showing off gun when it fired
